entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Partly cloudy. High minus 19.
